title: Vase
marks: Signature bottom, carved into bamboo: [ 竹美斎造之]
description: open sided square lantern-shaped basket: four bamboo posts support woven structure with open sides, wide, round opening at top, decorative knots at centers; crisscross woven base; crossing supports with loop for hanging at top; decorative weaving and knots at corners; short, squat bamboo insert for flowers
creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund; purchase from the collection of Elizabeth and Willard Clark
